code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{Card}from'react-bootstrap';import Rating from'./Rating';const Product=_ref=>{let{product}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Card,{className:"my-3 p-3"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(product._id)},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Card.Img,{src:product.image,variant:"top"})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Card.Body,null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(product._id)},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Card.Title,{as:"div"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("strong",null,product.name))),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Card.Text,{as:"div"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Rating,{value:product.rating,text:" ".concat(product.numReviews,"  reviews")})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Card.Text,{as:"h3"},"\u20B9 ",product.price)));};export default Product;

sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from './Rating' const Product = ({product}) => { return ( {product.name} {`\u20B9 `}{product.price} ) } export default Product
